file_content.text: [An elaborate script is carved into the stone. You scan it and let your datapad translate.]
I am Raklo-Mo. To me fell the task of breaking tradition.
I saw a vision. The Empire and Republic destroyed Voss. I told the interpreters.
The interpreters have grown lazy. They took the vision. They did not look at details.
They called the vision false--clearly, Voss was not destroyed.
I stood on the Step of Harmony. If the Three did not retrain the interpreters, I would walk out of Voss-Ka.
Since, interpreters have been trained better. We protected our art. It was threatened by outside influences. My vision showed it.
